name: We're Even Hydrating Longwear Waterproof Concealer
about: What it is:A 12-hour hydrating, long-wear concealer that comes in a wide range of medium-coverage shades with¬†a natural, second-skin finish..Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Prickly Pear Cactus Extract: A humectant that attracts moisture..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This concealer melts into skin, quickly and visibly evening, brightening, and hiding dark circles and puffiness for up to 12 hours. The extreme long-wear formula resists creasing, fading, sweat, and humidity and won‚Äôt settle into fine lines or accentuate skin texture. Plus, it‚Äôs transfer- and waterproof.
ingredients: -Prickly Pear Cactus Extract: A humectant that attracts moisture..-Sodium Hyaluronate: Hydrates and conditions..-Persian Silk Tree Extract: Helps target signs of fatigue around the eyes...Aqua/Water/Eau, Caprylyl Methicone, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Undecane, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Glycerin, Propanediol, Tridecane, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Saccharomyces Ferment, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Shorea Robusta Resin, Sodium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Octyldodecanol, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Hexyl Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylene Carbonate, Lauroyl Lysine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Finding your shade match made easy:.-Start with your Pro Filt‚Äôr ..-If you don‚Äôt know your Pro Filt‚Äôr #, start with your shade family..-Use your undertone as a guide (W = warm, N= neutral, C= cool)..-Swatch at least three shades and choose the shade that best matches your skin tone best and go lighter if you want to brighten..-If you are unable to swatch, check out our shade swatches online...How to apply:.-Dot or swipe formula anywhere you want to conceal and brighten: think under eyes, blemishes, or all over..-Blend with Precision Concealer Brush 180 (sold separately), fingers or sponge (best for all-over coverage)..Pro tip:.-If you have oily skin, set with Invisimatte Instant Setting + Blotting Powder (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this concealer from Fenty Beauty for free, in exchange to give my experience in this review. In short, this concealer is all that it says it is, hydrating, it's long wearing and natural, WHEN you prep, prime your face and set with powder. I tried the concealer by itself without my under eye primer, and without setting and it looked bad. On camera, it aged me and was very unnatural looking. However it redeemed itself once I primed and set, and I wore for 12 hours.. and it held up. I didn't feel the need to retouch my makeup at any point that day, and my under eyes did not look dry, which is a problem I can experience with full coverage concealers. Although full coverage, it looked natural, which I think made me feel slightly underwhelmed by this concealer. As much as it did a fantastic job, why am I not excited by the results? This Fenty concealer, performed just as good as my Natasha Denona concealer yet I am just bored by it, but it's a great everyday concealer. I don't wear my Natasha Denona concealer everyday because it can look too heavy for everyday but this Fenty concealer, I am more inclined because it's giving that coverage but yet looks NATURAL. And that is the take away from all this. My application tip would be this warning: it sets rather quickly so you can't take your time, and having the product just sit there. You want to work it into the skin quickly.

The first time wearing this I was assuming it'd crease upon application but the consistency and texture + it blending so well with a sponge and not feeling dry or crinkly, mind-blowing! The amount of product you need is minimal  but it is able to be buildable, though in my experience a few small dots along the under eye work well. I followed up with clear powder after applying & blending the product & went about my day. About 6-8 hours later I checked in and my under eye area looked just as good as earlier on. I could have touched it up a little to ensure full coverage of the concealer but I didn't choose to because I was home for the day. Compared to other concealers, this one impressed me with the color match and minimal amount per usage needed to do the job. There is no scent to the product like a lot of other concealers I have used in the past. The product dries down and blends into the skin versus looking like it's on top of the skin, even after being blended and set. The product is not sticky or heavy feeling which is something so different for me. reviews.review_text: Having tried numerous foundations in the past, I can confidently say that Fenty Foundation stands out from the crowd. Unlike other products, it offers buildable coverage that caters to various skin tones and types, ensuring a perfect match for everyone.  *Inclusive Shade Range: One of the standout benefits of owning Fenty Foundation is its extensive range of shades. With an impressive 50 shades to choose from, Fenty Beauty has set a new standard for inclusivity in the beauty industry, making it easier for individuals of all skin tones to find their ideal match.  *Long-lasting Wear: This foundation delivers long-lasting wear without feeling heavy or cakey on the skin. It stays put throughout the day, providing a smooth and even complexion that withstands humidity and sweat, making it perfect for all-day wear.  *Exceptional Coverage: Fenty Foundation excels in its ability to provide excellent coverage for imperfections, blemishes, and uneven skin tone. It effortlessly blurs out any flaws, leaving the skin looking flawless and radiant.  *Cruelty-free and Vegan: For those conscious about their beauty choices, Fenty Foundation is a fantastic option. It is cruelty-free and vegan, making it a guilt-free addition to your beauty routine.  As for whether I would buy this product, the answer is a resounding yes! The Fenty Foundation has become a staple in my makeup collection, and I can't imagine going without it. Its performance, shade range, and longevity make it a worthwhile investment.  Not only would I recommend this product to my friends and family, but I often find myself raving about it. Its versatility and ability to cater to a diverse range of skin tones make it a must-have for anyone seeking a high-quality foundation that delivers exceptional results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this product in exchange for an honest review.   Upon opening the product, I like there is a slight curvature to the doe foot applicator. For those that like to get more surface area painted, like the undereyes, this brush will hug against the contours of your eye socket or cheekbone unlike traditional straight applicators that require some hand angling to utilize the full brush. The pointed tip at the end is also versatile for spot concealing. While there is no fragrance added, there is a noticeable cosmetic scent if anyone is particularly wary of heavy scents in products.  The coverage is about light medium and can be built up without compromising too much of the skin like finish (almost satin/demi-matte). A few hours after application, both the swatches on the back of my hand and areas on my face that I spot concealed have retained the satin finish. As someone with oily skin, the product does fade somewhat after hours of wear but this is naturally occurring without touch ups or powdering. My fine lines and dry patches are not exaggerated with the initial wear. The blurring effect is achieved by the product mending with the skin's natural texture rather than filling in crevices. I did experience minor oxidation but it's almost undetectable under harsh LED light. Overall, I enjoy that the formula feels light on the skin and the natural finish will always be there whether I want a more sheer effect or more heavy duty coverage on acne marks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation. I have dry facial skin and other foundations always emphasize the dryness of my skin, but this foundation masks all the imperfections and unevenness on my face. I like that it is not very dense, you don‚Äôt feel it on your face, you don‚Äôt feel like you have a mask on your face. It is also very convenient that this foundation with a brush can be applied precisely to pimples and redness. A big plus is that the shade suited me perfectly, it does not differ from the color of my skin.
